result.title: Algorithms for fluid simulation on 2d bitmap
result.content:
Life has become so wonderful when it comes in touch with algorithms. When we can see the visualize effect of any algorithm then we can feel its aesthetic beauty which is not describable in mere words. Recently I came to see simulation of watercolor on 2d bitmap in android. The algorihm used for the simulation was Lattice Boltzmann's method for 2d dynamics. Lattice Boltzmann .

The visual effect was pretty awesome but unfortunately the performance was poor, it was kind of laggy. I went through some applications to see the watercolor simulation effect. I've tried a wonderful and well known app in android for drawing like ArtRage. But still the simulation was slow.

I've found some optimization of LatticeBoltzmann method Optimization

Can anyone please share his/her experience with fluid simulation algorithms and any optimizations / fast implementation to Lattice Boltzmann method.
